alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Lucie and northern Okeechobee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 445 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Drum. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Basinger, Fort Drum, Kissimmee Prairie Preserve, and Country Hills Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee
